# `polars reverse` for [lazyframe](/commands/categories/lazyframe.md)

<div class='command-title'>Reverses the LazyFrame</div>

## Signature

```> polars reverse {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input | output |
| ----- | ------ |
| any   | any    |

## Examples

Reverses the dataframe.
```nu
> [[a b]; [6 2] [4 2] [2 2]] | polars into-df | polars reverse
╭───┬───┬───╮
│ # │ a │ b │
├───┼───┼───┤
│ 0 │ 2 │ 2 │
│ 1 │ 4 │ 2 │
│ 2 │ 6 │ 2 │
╰───┴───┴───╯

```
